    • Method Detail

      • getUnderlyingTransaction

        public jvstm.TopLevelTransaction getUnderlyingTransaction()
        Description copied from class: CommitOnlyTransaction
        Get the concrete transaction that will be committed. For local commits this should be the local tx instance, help by the LocalCommitOnlyTransaction. For remote commits this should be the RemoteCommitOnlyTransaction instance itself.
        Specified by:
        getUnderlyingTransaction in class CommitOnlyTransaction
